<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
LEGAL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/10/22/goldman-admits-1mdb-bribes?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Goldman Will Pay a Sach of Cash For 1MDB Scandal
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="The text " We Did It" in the format of Goldman Sachs's logo " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yODY5L2dvbGRtYW5fMW1kYi5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">No, this isn't about the site you go to when you want to see if that guy from that movie was also in that other thing. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, Goldman Sachs's Malaysian subsidiary <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-goldman-sachs-1mdb-settlement/goldman-sachs-to-pay-nearly-3-billion-to-settle-charges-over-1mdb-scandal-role-idUSKBN27726Z?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">pleaded guilty</a> to breaking U.S. anti-corruption laws when it paid bribes to officials in the Southeast Asian country. The bank will pay almost $3 billion to resolve the case. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The backstory: </strong>In 2012–2013, Goldman <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/22/business/goldman-sachs-fraud-guilty-plea.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">helped</a> Malaysia's sovereign wealth fund, 1Malaysia Development Berhad (aka 1MDB), raise $6.5 billion in bond offerings, pocketing a cool $600 million in fees in the process. Authorities say a lot of that $6.5 billion was pilfered and used to buy, uh, non-essential items, such as a clear acrylic piano and a boutique hotel in Beverly Hills.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The scandal was one of the largest in financial history and led to the political demise of former Malaysian Prime Minister Najib Razak.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>In the plea deal, Goldman admitted that its employees worked with financier and international fugitive Jho Low to pay bribes of over $1 billion to Malaysian authorities in connection with the allegedly swiped funds. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In July, Goldman <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/07/24/goldman-reaches-settlement-malaysia-1mdb-scandal?email={{profile.email}}&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">settled</a> with the Malaysian government for $3.9 billion. Prosecutors have brought charges against two individual Goldman bankers, Tim Leissner and Roger Ng. Leissner has pleaded guilty, but Ng maintains his innocence. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The fallout will hit DJ D-Sol's piggy bank </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Goldman <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/goldman-sachs-to-recoup-top-executives-pay-after-costly-1mdb-fines-11603380050?mod=hp_lead_pos1&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">plans</a> to seize or withhold $174 million from current and former execs, including CEO David Solomon, and claw back some of former CEO Lloyd Blankfein's past bonuses to help cover the bill. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Otherwise, the payout would have to be solely covered by shareholders and current employees' bonuses. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>analysts said placing the scandal in the rearview mirror gives Solomon the opportunity to execute his plans to make Goldman a more "conventional" bank. </p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
COVID
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/10/22/remdesivir-nabs-fda-approval?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Some Good Covid News
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, Gilead drug remdesivir <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/10/22/fda-approves-gileads-remdesivir-as-coronavirus-treatment.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">became</a> the first and only Covid-19 treatment to be fully approved by the FDA.  </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The agency had granted the drug emergency use authorization in May, but now it has a more official stamp of approval. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Gilead shares bounced more than 3% after hours. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Since it was greenlit for emergency use, remdesivir has been administered via IV to patients hospitalized with Covid-19. Studies have found that it modestly shortens recovery times for some of those patients, and it took a star turn as one of the drugs used to treat President Trump after he tested positive. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>in August, Gilead said it planned to produce more than 2 million treatment courses by the end of the year, plus several million more in 2021.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
POLITICS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/10/23/biden-trump-face-off-final-debate?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Biden and Trump Have a Nice Long Chat
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Joe Biden and Donald Trump onstage at the last 2020 presidential debate " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yODgxL2ZpbmFsX3ByZXNpZGVudGlhbF9kZWJhdGVfMjAyMC5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Justin Sullivan/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Congratulations, you don’t have to feign interest in another debate until 2024. Last night in Nashville, NBC News’s Kristen Welker wielded the mute button in the final—and more civil—<a href="https://apps.npr.org/liveblogs/20201022-debate/#top?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">presidential debate</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Covid-19:</strong> Trump doubled down on the optimistic timeline a vaccine will be ready by year’s end, name-dropping promising candidates from J&J, Moderna, and Pfizer. No pressure.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The president also pressed for school and business reopenings, but Biden didn’t rule out further lockdowns in areas with spiking infections, keying in on projections that 200,000+ more Americans could die from Covid-19 this year.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">On the topic of healthcare…</strong>the candidates agreed to disagree. With the Affordable Care Act up before the Supreme Court next month, Trump still hasn’t released a plan to replace it. Biden distanced himself from the Democratic Party’s progressive vision with promises his plan would support existing private health insurance.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Small businesses: </strong>Biden pledged support for a $15 minimum wage, while Trump said he’d consider it “to an extent.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Climate:</strong> Biden said his plan would transition to cleaner industries, create millions of jobs, and get the U.S. to zero emissions. Trump said Biden would "destroy the oil industry." </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>For the 45+ million Americans who already voted, this debate didn’t change much. T-minus 11 days for everyone else. </p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TRENDING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/10/22/whats-whats?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
What's Up, What's Down
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="A gif of a dog wearing glasses and a bandana climbing up behind its owner on a motorcycle" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=504 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/4huo31PRqTWve/giphy.gif">

<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="A gif of a dog wearing glasses and a bandana climbing up behind its owner on a motorcycle" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/4huo31PRqTWve/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">What's up </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Two-wheelers:</strong> The pandemic has boosted sales of motorcycles and scooters in cities around the world, <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-10-22/the-pandemic-has-kick-started-a-motorcycle-boom?srnd=premium&sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Bloomberg reports</a>.  </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Restaurants: </strong>Nearly 6,500 new restaurants and food businesses <a href="https://www.yelpeconomicaverage.com/yea-q3-2020.html#methodology?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">opened</a> last month, according to Yelp. New openings are nearing or outpacing levels from the last four years.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Million-dollar homes: </strong>Nice flex. Home purchases worth $1+ million have <a href="https://www.npr.org/sections/coronavirus-live-updates/2020/10/22/926657942/housing-boom-sales-of-million-dollar-homes-double?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">more than doubled</a> since last year. Median home prices hit a record $311,800 in September as home sales rose 20% annually. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Christmas toys:</strong> Mattel sales <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mattel-results/mattel-forecasts-holiday-season-growth-as-toy-demand-surges-idUSKBN2772Y2?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">jumped</a> 10% last quarter, the toymaker’s biggest increase in a decade. Sales in its Barbie line rose 29%.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">What's down </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Airlines: </strong>The four biggest U.S. carriers <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/airlines-losses-mount-amid-pandemic-but-travel-demand-shows-some-improvement-11603372966?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">reported</a> $10.8 billion in Q3 losses. While bookings are picking up, air travel volume is still down over 60% and execs are anticipating a subdued holiday season.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Jobless claims:</strong> First-time applications for unemployment benefits <a href="https://apnews.com/article/us-jobless-claims-drop-to-787000-42a89d61a838bd0aea6763b5b011469a?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">fell</a> to 787,000 last week—an improvement from two weeks ago, but still more than triple the pre-pandemic levels. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Christmas spirit: </strong>Macy's won't <a href="https://apnews.com/article/virus-outbreak-new-york-thanksgiving-holidays-christmas-324551e9bc38e19042b136514136d166?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">bring Santa</a> to its flagship NYC store this year. Mr. Claus typically attracts 250k visitors each year.</p>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPORTS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/10/22/mayors-warn-covid19-spread-big-ten-football-kicks-off?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The Road to the Rose Bowl Is Lined With Thorns
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="COLUMBUS, OH - OCTOBER 01: General view of the Big Ten logo on a yard ma..." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yODcyL3J1dGdlcnNfdl9vaGlvX3N0YXRlLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Joe Robbins/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In the Big Ten, which <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/sports/2020/10/22/big-ten-football-mayors-worried/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">resumes playing football tonight</a>, not even having a Big House can save you from coronavirus anxieties. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">11 mayors of Big Ten cities (there are 14 schools overall, it’s confusing) wrote a <a href="https://www.cityofeastlansing.com/DocumentCenter/View/10055/Letter-to-the-Big-Ten-Conference-PDF?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">letter</a> to conference officials this week highlighting their concerns that football games, even without fans in the stadiums, could lead to coronavirus outbreaks. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">The tl;dr: </strong></span><span>The mayors said they recognize the importance of Big Ten football to local businesses, but urged the conference to use caution and keep the coronavirus from spiking in their communities. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">They also requested that games not be scheduled in the late afternoon or evening, which would lead to more people hanging out to watch on TV and increase the risk of infection. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Case study: </strong>the University of Michigan in Ann Arbor. On Tuesday, county officials issued a <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/21/us/university-michigan-stay-in-place-order-testing.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">stay-at-home order</a> for undergrads following a rising number of student cases. The order applies through Nov. 3, crucially after the big Michigan/Michigan State matchup on Halloween night that could be party central. </p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">No way—that's exactly what we're looking for. width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yODY5L2dvbGRtYW5fMW1kYi5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eFrancis Scialabba\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eNo, this isn't about the site you go to when you want to see if that guy from that movie was also in that other thing. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eYesterday, Goldman Sachs's Malaysian subsidiary \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-goldman-sachs-1mdb-settlement/goldman-sachs-to-pay-nearly-3-billion-to-settle-charges-over-1mdb-scandal-role-idUSKBN27726Z?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epleaded guilty\u003c/a\u003e to breaking U.S. anti-corruption laws when it paid bribes to officials in the Southeast Asian country. The bank will pay almost $3 billion to resolve the case. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe backstory: \u003c/strong\u003eIn 2012–2013, Goldman \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/22/business/goldman-sachs-fraud-guilty-plea.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehelped\u003c/a\u003e Malaysia's sovereign wealth fund, 1Malaysia Development Berhad (aka 1MDB), raise $6.5 billion in bond offerings, pocketing a cool $600 million in fees in the process. Authorities say a lot of that $6.5 billion was pilfered and used to buy, uh, non-essential items, such as a clear acrylic piano and a boutique hotel in Beverly Hills.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe scandal was one of the largest in financial history and led to the political demise of former Malaysian Prime Minister Najib Razak.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eIn the plea deal, Goldman admitted that its employees worked with financier and international fugitive Jho Low to pay bribes of over $1 billion to Malaysian authorities in connection with the allegedly swiped funds. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn July, Goldman \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/07/24/goldman-reaches-settlement-malaysia-1mdb-scandal?email={{profile.email}}\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esettled\u003c/a\u003e with the Malaysian government for $3.9 billion. Prosecutors have brought charges against two individual Goldman bankers, Tim Leissner and Roger Ng. Leissner has pleaded guilty, but Ng maintains his innocence. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThe fallout will hit DJ D-Sol's piggy bank \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eGoldman \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/goldman-sachs-to-recoup-top-executives-pay-after-costly-1mdb-fines-11603380050?mod=hp_lead_pos1\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eplans\u003c/a\u003e to seize or withhold $174 million from current and former execs, including CEO David Solomon, and claw back some of former CEO Lloyd Blankfein's past bonuses to help cover the bill. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eOtherwise, the payout would have to be solely covered by shareholders and current employees' bonuses. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eanalysts said placing the scandal in the rearview mirror gives Solomon the opportunity to execute his plans to make Goldman a more \"conventional\" bank. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eYesterday, Gilead drug remdesivir \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/10/22/fda-approves-gileads-remdesivir-as-coronavirus-treatment.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebecame\u003c/a\u003e the first and only Covid-19 treatment to be fully approved by the FDA.  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe agency had granted the drug emergency use authorization in May, but now it has a more official stamp of approval. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eGilead shares bounced more than 3% after hours. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSince it was greenlit for emergency use, remdesivir has been administered via IV to patients hospitalized with Covid-19. Studies have found that it modestly shortens recovery times for some of those patients, and it took a star turn as one of the drugs used to treat President Trump after he tested positive. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003ein August, Gilead said it planned to produce more than 2 million treatment courses by the end of the year, plus several million more in 2021.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eCongratulations, you don’t have to feign interest in another debate until 2024. Last night in Nashville, NBC News’s Kristen Welker wielded the mute button in the final—and more civil—\u003ca href=\"https://apps.npr.org/liveblogs/20201022-debate/#top?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epresidential debate\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eCovid-19:\u003c/strong\u003e Trump doubled down on the optimistic timeline a vaccine will be ready by year’s end, name-dropping promising candidates from J\u0026J, Moderna, and Pfizer. No pressure.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe president also pressed for school and business reopenings, but Biden didn’t rule out further lockdowns in areas with spiking infections, keying in on projections that 200,000+ more Americans could die from Covid-19 this year.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eOn the topic of healthcare…\u003c/strong\u003ethe candidates agreed to disagree. With the Affordable Care Act up before the Supreme Court next month, Trump still hasn’t released a plan to replace it. Biden distanced himself from the Democratic Party’s progressive vision with promises his plan would support existing private health insurance.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eSmall businesses: \u003c/strong\u003eBiden pledged support for a $15 minimum wage, while Trump said he’d consider it “to an extent.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eClimate:\u003c/strong\u003e Biden said his plan would transition to cleaner industries, create millions of jobs, and get the U.S. to zero emissions. Trump said Biden would \"destroy the oil industry.\" \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eFor the 45+ million Americans who already voted, this debate didn’t change much. style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eRestaurants: \u003c/strong\u003eNearly 6,500 new restaurants and food businesses \u003ca href=\"https://www.yelpeconomicaverage.com/yea-q3-2020.html#methodology?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eopened\u003c/a\u003e last month, according to Yelp. New openings are nearing or outpacing levels from the last four years.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eMillion-dollar homes: \u003c/strong\u003eNice flex. Home purchases worth $1+ million have \u003ca href=\"https://www.npr.org/sections/coronavirus-live-updates/2020/10/22/926657942/housing-boom-sales-of-million-dollar-homes-double?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003emore than doubled\u003c/a\u003e since last year. Median home prices hit a record $311,800 in September as home sales rose 20% annually. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eChristmas toys:\u003c/strong\u003e Mattel sales \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mattel-results/mattel-forecasts-holiday-season-growth-as-toy-demand-surges-idUSKBN2772Y2?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ejumped\u003c/a\u003e 10% last quarter, the toymaker’s biggest increase in a decade. Sales in its Barbie line rose 29%.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWhat's down \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eAirlines: \u003c/strong\u003eThe four biggest U.S. carriers \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/airlines-losses-mount-amid-pandemic-but-travel-demand-shows-some-improvement-11603372966?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ereported\u003c/a\u003e $10.8 billion in Q3 losses. While bookings are picking up, air travel volume is still down over 60% and execs are anticipating a subdued holiday season.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eJobless claims:\u003c/strong\u003e First-time applications for unemployment benefits \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/article/us-jobless-claims-drop-to-787000-42a89d61a838bd0aea6763b5b011469a?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efell\u003c/a\u003e to 787,000 last week—an improvement from two weeks ago, but still more than triple the pre-pandemic levels. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eChristmas spirit: \u003c/strong\u003eMacy's won't \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/article/virus-outbreak-new-york-thanksgiving-holidays-christmas-324551e9bc38e19042b136514136d166?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebring Santa\u003c/a\u003e to its flagship NYC store this year. collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn the Big Ten, which \u003ca href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/sports/2020/10/22/big-ten-football-mayors-worried/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eresumes playing football tonight\u003c/a\u003e, not even having a Big House can save you from coronavirus anxieties. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e11 mayors of Big Ten cities (there are 14 schools overall, it’s confusing) wrote a \u003ca href=\"https://www.cityofeastlansing.com/DocumentCenter/View/10055/Letter-to-the-Big-Ten-Conference-PDF?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eletter\u003c/a\u003e to conference officials this week highlighting their concerns that football games, even without fans in the stadiums, could lead to coronavirus outbreaks. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe tl;dr: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe mayors said they recognize the importance of Big Ten football to local businesses, but urged the conference to use caution and keep the coronavirus from spiking in their communities. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThey also requested that games not be scheduled in the late afternoon or evening, which would lead to more people hanging out to watch on TV and increase the risk of infection. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eCase study: \u003c/strong\u003ethe University of Michigan in Ann Arbor. On Tuesday, county officials issued a \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/21/us/university-michigan-stay-in-place-order-testing.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estay-at-home order\u003c/a\u003e for undergrads following a rising number of student cases.
